column1: '''''The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[George Allen and Unwin
column2: George Allen & Unwin]] in [[1976]]. It features art by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', with commentary by [[Christopher Tolkien]].

column1: * Cover -  From the jacket of the original editions [of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'']

* April - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - The Forest of Lothlorien in Spring.jpg
column2: The Forest of Lothlorien in Spring]]"

column1: * June - "[[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Helm's Deep and the Hornburg.jpg
* December - "Leaves from the Book of Mazarbul" ([[:File:J.R.R. Tolkien - Mazarbul page 2.jpg
